Row.Text: The first of {1_LeaderName}'s Treasure Fleets has just reached their port safely. This is a step down the {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} Legacy Path for them; if we hope to succeed, we must establish our own Distant Lands settlements.

Our operatives report that {2_LeaderName} has established the settlement of {1_City} in Distant Lands. They may make pursuing {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} and {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Legacy Paths more difficult. We must stay vigilant — rivalry can be fertile ground for war.

Another religion has taken root in {1_City} in Distant Lands, the populace rejecting the influence of our own priests. If we bring them back to the fold, we can continue down the {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Legacy Path.
Missionaries from abroad have captivated the inhabitants of {1_City} — an ill portent. If we lose our people's hearts, we may lose more.
